sentences.cn: …敌人战斗轰炸机隆隆的轰鸣声。

sentences.en: An edited recording of one of Beijing's most spectacular sonic experiences.
sentences.cn: 一段经过编辑,壮观的北京声音经历.

sentences.en: Blade is testing Shen's new weaponry, and showing off an ultra - sonic projector.
sentences.cn: 刀锋正在测试着沈的新武器, 接着尝试了一下那只超音速投射器.

sentences.en: Depth of investigation in sonic logging is studied based on wave acoustics.
sentences.cn: 从波动声学的角度讨论声波测井的探测深度问题.

sentences.en: He activated the door with the miniature sonic transmitter.
sentences.cn: 他用微型声波发射器开启了门。

sentences.en: He found that the sonic surface was, in general, discontinuous.
sentences.cn: 他发现声速面通常是不连续的.

sentences.en: It has tested nodularity and matrix - structure on the principle of sonic resonance.
sentences.cn: 依据音频共振原理检测了球化率和基体组织参量.

sentences.en: Ms Wu, with her " large sonic vocabulary ", was uniquely qualified.
sentences.cn: 拥有 “ 丰富的声汇量 ” 的吴女士当之无愧.

sentences.en: Pioneer TX - 9500 II - Clean , articulate sound. Lighter sonic presentation against the L - 02 T.
sentences.cn: 57先锋的TX-9500干净而清爽的声音表现, 相对于建伍的L-02T声音表现较亮.

sentences.en: Pneumatic signals will travel only at sonic speeds.
sentences.cn: 气动信号的传输速度仅仅相当于音速.

sentences.en: Sonic oscillator provides a very efficient means of breaking cells or organelles.
sentences.cn: 超声振荡器为破碎细胞或细胞器提供一种很有效的手段.

sentences.en: Sounds are classified into two kinds: sonic and ultrasonic.
sentences.cn: 声波分为两类, 即 普通声波与超声波.

sentences.en: The flight speed of new - style SST plane is 3 times sonic.
sentences.cn: 新型SST飞机的飞行速度为音速的3倍.

sentences.en: The holes themselves have a restricting or stabilizing effect because flow may become sonic.
sentences.cn: 因为这时流动可成为音速流动,所以这些小孔本身有一种节制作用或稳定化作用.

sentences.en: The new aircraft creates a sonic boom.
sentences.cn: 那种新飞机会产生声震.

sentences.en: Three additional comments on sonic sounder operation are considered pertinent.
sentences.cn: 关于回声仪的操作方面还有三点必须提及.

words.tran_cn: 响亮的；作响的；能发出响亮声音的
音速的；[声]声音的；音波的

phrases.tran_cn: 超音波爆声；音爆（等于sonic bang）

trans.tran_cn: <物>音波的，音速的，能发声音的
trans.tran_en: relating to sound,  sound waves  , or the speed of sound
